comments.author: snead
comments.body: So, I attempted to sign up to freebitcoin.games, and this is what happened. First, I click to Accept Cookies and get a pop up ad. Close the pop up ad and click Accept Cookies again, worked. Now, every line in the signup form, username, password, etc each spawns a popup ad. The squares of the captcha spawn popups. Finally get through all that and it says check for confirmation email. No confirmation email, check spam folder, not there either. Go back, click Resend Confirmation Email, get another popup. Click again, still no email. Not in Spam folder. If this is how it was designed, to serve a bunch of popups to a user one time, it works well. If you're actually trying to get users, not so much.
